testcase.classname: To test the Painting and Cleaning module
testcase.name: To validate contact now page in Blogsy
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on Home page...........................................passed When user selects blog from the menu........................................passed And user gets navigated to blog page and scrolls down.......................passed And user clicks on Top Blogs................................................passed And user scrolls down the page..............................................passed And user chooses a link from renting part...................................passed And user gets navigated to the page and scrolls down........................passed And user fills the contact us form..........................................passed And clicks on submit button.................................................passed Then it should show a success message for the form submission...............passed
